title: Stalking
description: No one had the right to try to control another.Emma Reynolds had her life planned--find her estranged father, enroll in college, get her degree, then get her man. In that exact order.And she was making inroads in that plan. She had found her father, enrolled and completed all but her last week of college, and had found the man she'd love the rest of her life.But someone thought they had the right to threaten that plan...
author: Calle J. Brookes
